p:
Finally, high ACE2 activity is associated with reduced severity of ARDS among patients with lower respiratory tract infection caused by RSV.
70 Fedson etÂ al. (2016, 2020) observed that statins target the host response to infection (endothelial dysfunction) rather than the virus itself, and suggested that combination therapy with ARB and statins might accelerate a return to homeostasis, allowing patients to recover on their own.
